gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: EMODnet CHEMISTRY

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Combined DIVA 4D 6-year analysis of Water body dissolved oxygen concentration

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Combined product of Water body dissolved oxygen concentration based on DIVA 4D 6-year analysis on five regions : Atlantic Sea, North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Mediterranean Sea. The boundaries and overlapping zones between these five regions were filtered to avoid any unrealistic spatial discontinuities. This combined water body dissolved oxygen concentration product is masked using the relative error threshold 0.5. Units: umol/l
